title: Michael Selected for British Triathlon Olympic Programme 2026
content: Exciting news! Michael has been selected for the prestigious British Triathlon Olympic World Class Programme for 2026. This is a huge step towards his Olympic dreams and recognizes his outstanding performances throughout the 2025 season.

title: Bronze Medal at World Triathlon Cup Miyazaki
content: Michael claimed his first World Cup podium with a brilliant bronze medal finish in Miyazaki, Japan! He held off fierce competition in a thrilling sprint finish to secure 3rd place. This career-best World Cup result marks a major milestone in his journey.

title: Italian Sprint Triathlon Champion 2025
content: History made in Cervia! Michael won the Italian Sprint Triathlon Championships with a dominant performance, finishing in 51:54 and beating Nicola Azzano by 11 seconds. He was also crowned U23 Italian Champion on the same day!
